entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
